CustomField.formula: IF( Uniek_Segment__c = "Wasserij", "https://kleda.nl/client/offerte-bevestigen/" & "?prijspakket1=" & SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Totale_Prijs__c), ".", ",") & "&prijspakket2=" & SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Totale_Prijs__c), ".", ",") & "&prijspakket3=" & SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Totale_Prijs__c), ".", ",") & "&offertenummer=" & Leadnummer__c, IF( Uniek_Segment__c = "Tapijt- en Meubelreiniging", "https://staging.cincocleaning.com/client/offerte-bevestigen/" & "?prijspakket1=" & SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Totale_Prijs__c), ".", ",") & "&prijspakket2=" & SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Totale_Prijs__c), ".", ",") & "&prijspakket3=" & SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Totale_Prijs__c), ".", ",") & "&offertenummer=" & Leadnummer__c, "" ) )
CustomField.label: Offerte Bevestigen URL
